messages.title: My Priorities For You and Southampton
messages.content: Southampton is a great place to live and work. We need a council to deliver lower taxes, a real clean air strategy for our city and a plan of action for: Public consultation and investment in key services such as children's services, Support local businesses to prosper and grow by taking City Growth forward.

messages.title: Investing in Education
messages.content: Schools are incredibly important and good schools are the key to successful futures for our young people.

messages.title: Getting the Best Deal for Southampton
messages.content: Paul is standing with Theresa May to ensure that Brexit works for everyone in Southampton.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Making Brexit a success is central to our national interest.
Build a stronger economy that rewards people who work hard and make life easier for everyone.
Make the NHS the priority it truly is.

Southampton is a great place to live and work.
Getting the best deal for Southampton
Support local businesses to prosper and grow by taking City Growth forward.
Making Brexit a success is central to our national interest.
Build a stronger economy that rewards people who work hard and make life easier for everyone.
Make the NHS the priority it truly is.
The risk is just too big to take: HIGHER DEBT, HIGHER TAXES, ECONOMIC CHAOS
Our candidates promise that we will deliver the best Brexit deal – striking new trade deals that create sustainable jobs and provide security for Britain.
A coalition of chaos with Jeremy Corbyn
Think Jeremy Corbyn as Prime Minister is never going to happen? DON'T BE SO SURE
